page.title: 15Park Hall
page.content: Dates back to Norman Conquest. Land granted to Roger Poitou by William I for services rendered. In recent years since opening of M6 motorway, has been developed into a leisure complex incor- porating a hotel, restaurant, night club,bars, banqueting hall,squash court garden centre, caravan park and theme park. The latest development currently under construction is a holiday village. The determining factor in the siting and success of these develop- ments has been the M6 motorway,which gives easy access to thousands of people. Another important feature is the nature of the landscape - 130 acres of very pleasing parkland set in typical English pastoral countryside.
